price: Na εnyε ntafowayifoͻ nso kasaa, - εho adwen a modwen no sua.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
